name: Super Tennis Bros.
description:
Created for UTS Game Design Studio 1 Lab 4.

Play local multiplayer with up to four players. Supports keyboard and controllers.

Menu Controls:

  • Change Teams - A/D / Left Stick
  • Confirm / Toggle Ready - R / East Button
  • Add Bot - T / Right Trigger
  • Remove Bot - / Left Trigger
  • Back - T / South Button

Game Controls:

  • Movement - WASD / Left Stick
  • Sprint - R / East Button
